alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Cumberland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 9:39AM EST until January 08 at 2:30AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3 affecting Bladen and Cumberland Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 45.0 feet, Flood waters will affect lowlands along the east bank of the river with some minor overflow along the west bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 43.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EST Wednesday was 43.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 43.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 43.9 feet on 03/03/1995. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Cape Fear River William O Huske Lock And Dam 42.0 43.0 Wed 9 am EST 43.9 43.0 40. 2 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=ilm The next statement will be issued late tonight at 345 AM EST.
